trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> создается, когда <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> объекта вызывает <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> событий.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the values for the new and the previous <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы получить значения для нового и предыдущей <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, доступ <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> и <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> свойства в обработчике для события.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the information that is available about the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере демонстрируется сведения о <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> событий.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> before the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged" /> event.
Returns the state of the synthesizer before the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает состояние синтезатора перед изменением состояния.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> Свойство представляет состояние синтезатора с членом <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> перечисления.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> before the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged" /> event.
The state of the synthesizer after the state changed.
The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> Свойство представляет состояние синтезатора с членом <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> перечисления.
